text: Joseph William Swain de Graft-Johnson (6 October 1933 â€“ 22 April 1999) was a Ghanaian engineer, academic and politician. He was the Vice-President of Ghana from 1979 to 1981. De Graft-Johnson died on 22 April 1999 in London, England at the age of 65. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:1999 deaths Category:Living people Category:Vice presidents of Ghana
title: Joseph W.S. de Graft-Johnson
